import { ArticleData, CommentData } from './Application' import React from 'react' type PropsType = { articleData: ArticleData } export const Article = (props: PropsType) => { let author = props.articleData.author let article = props.articleData.text let date = props.articleData.date return (
{blog && (

{blog.title}

{blog.category}
{blog.post} )}
) }
